history.proof: intros m k x z Hmap Hsucc. strivial use: cA_cA_1_B inv: sumbool.

original: intros m k x z Hmap Hsucc. unfold cA. destruct Hmap as [Hmap _]. destruct Hsucc as [_ Hsucc]. destruct (eq_dart_dec x z) as [Heq | Hneq]. + rewrite Heq. reflexivity. + destruct (eq_dart_dec (top m k x) z) as [Heqtop | Hneqtop]. ++ apply cA_top; auto. ++ apply cA_eq; auto.
